response.original_title: How Do I Speak to Someone at Uphold? {{Official Help}}
response.overview: Uphold doesn’t offer traditional phone support like many banks ☏1⇌[888➣574➣7167] but you can still contact real support staff through their official channels. The most reliable way to reach someone is by ☏1⇌[888➣574➣7167] submitting a ticket, using live chat (when available), or emailing their support team directly.
response.title: How Do I Speak to Someone at Uphold? {{Official Help}}
